item.title: How this site works - and what is expected of you
item.author: invalid@example.com (TCUP)
item.category: How this site works - and what is expected of you
item.dc:creator: TCUP
item.content:encoded:
Welcome! In order to feed the creativity of the Twin Cities music scene, we want to stock the tCUPBOARD with the most nutritious and delicious information possible. Here are a few guidelines for how to keep things fresh!

1 Organize our shelves: In order to locate the right ingredients for our musical needs, make sure to make posts in the appropriate section -- and when in doubt, just start a thread in Spill the tea [general chat]
2 Keep it bite-sized: Use your best table...

Read more
